pkgmetadata.longdescription: ocp-gordon provides Gordon surface fitting functionality for OCP (Open CASCADE Python bindings). Gordon surfaces are constructed by interpolating a network of curves, useful for creating smooth surfaces in parametric CAD modeling with build123d and CadQuery.
ocp-gordon为OCP（Open CASCADE Python绑定）提供Gordon曲面拟合功能。Gordon 曲面通过插值曲线网络构建，适用于在build123d和CadQuery的参数化CAD建模中创建 平滑曲面。
